node.title: Judge John Hodgman on the Secret Flip Off
node.description: A married couple have different ways of showing love â€” and ire.
node.content: ["Taylor writes: I recently caught my wife, Leslie, secretly flipping me off while I was cooking. She admitted she does this often \u2014 not just to me, but to anyone who has drawn her ire. Please order Leslie to flip me off to my face. Even just muttering \u201cbird\u201d behind my back would help maintain communication with my lovely wife \u2014 whom I admittedly flip off jokingly from time to time. To. Her. Face.", "I could order her to stop, but let\u2019s face it: Leslie will then just press her middle finger to that picture of my face, and then start double flipping you off behind your back. I get that this makes you uncomfortable. But picture my hand when I say: Sit on it, Taylor. While you are happily married, Leslie still deserves her own inner life. That said, I do encourage your low-muttered \u201cbird\u201d suggestion, as it\u2019s hilarious, and it might prompt discussion as to why you two are so bird-worthy all the time. ", ""]
